authors.headline: Clinical Radiochemist, Head of Quality Control (PhD) in Erasmus MC

profile_positions.title: Clinical Radiochemist, Head of Quality Control (PhD)

profile_positions.description:
STSM period : 10-11-2013 – 16-11-2013

This STSM is based on a cooperation between Demokritos (Athens) and Erasmus MC (Rotterdam). In near future a PRRT therapy (Peptide Receptor Radionuclide Therapy) study is planned with the in vivo rapidly degrading minigastrin analogue 177Lu-DOTA-SG5, administered without or with co-injection of the NEP (neutral endopeptidase) inhibitor PA (phosphoramidon). This study will explore the potential benefit of transient NEP inhibition on the therapeutic effect of [177Lu]SG5 on CCK2 receptor-expressing tumour models.
profile_positions.title: Optimization of Studies with [177Lu]SG5 in Small Animals
